fields.label: Authorize
fields.name: googlesheets
fields.description: If you want your Neuclone apps to modify your Google sheets, make sure to select read and write access

radiolabel.label: Read Only
radiolabel.description: Your Neuclone can only read data from Google sheets.

radiolabel.label: Read and write
radiolabel.description: Your Neuclone apps can read data from sheets, modify sheets, and more.
